title: PODCAST: Binge is the new black
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

It isn't clear if the House of Representatives will go along with streamlining a package of trade deals. More on that. Plus, investors seem nervous about the near-term outlook for airline stocks. They’re worried about increased competition leading to overcapacity. So what’s the outlook for ticket prices in the current environment? And with the third season of ‘Orange is the New Black’ on Netflix, we look at whether we’re headed to a world of all-binge-all-the-time.

","type":"text/html"}]
teaser: Trade deals, airline prices, and binge-watching television.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, June 12, 2015
description: Trade deals, airline prices, and binge-watching television.
contentencoded: It isn't clear if the House of Representatives will go along with streamlining a package of trade deals. More on that. Plus, investors seem nervous about the near-term outlook for airline stocks. They’re worried about increased competition leading to overcapacity. So what’s the outlook for ticket prices in the current environment? And with the third season of ‘Orange is the New Black’ on Netflix, we look at whether we’re headed to a world of all-binge-all-the-time.
